name: Ext_R2_MedicationOrder_reason
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.MedicationOrder.reason[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents MedicationOrder.reason[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/MedicationOrder|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: Reason or indication for writing the prescription
element.definition: Can be the reason or the indication for writing the prescription.
element.comment: `MedicationRequest.reasonCode` maps to R4B `MedicationRequest.reasonCode`. So is mapped as Equivalent. `MedicationRequest.reasonReference` maps to R4B `MedicationRequest.reasonReference`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
